duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop plans appropriate to deliver against the business requirements of the aircraft maintenance industry.
Lead and deliver change in the aircraft maintenance environment.
Manage and lead line engineers and support staff in a unionized environment.
Ensure compliance with company, local, and national HS&E regulations and aviation regulatory requirements for the area of responsibility.
Diagnose and repair aircraft maintenance issues.

education_certification.credential: Engineering Degree or equivalent. Additionally, UK CAA Part 66, EASA Part 66 licence or NAA equivalent, and minimum 5 years verifiable experience within the Aircraft Maintenance Industry is required.
